title: Samsung Galaxy A56, A36 and A26 are now in stores, here are the first deals

html:
The Samsung Galaxy A56, Galaxy A36 and Galaxy A26 are now available – well, some regions still say “pre-order, coming on March 21”, but unless you pick the fastest shipping, they are as good as available.


Galaxy A56 and A36 offer in the UK

We checked out the prices and offers in the UK, Germany and India, but do have a look in other regions as well.

In the UK, the A56 and A36 come with a free Galaxy Fit3, 45W charger and a silicone case. The three accessories are valued at £138.98. The A26 gets no freebies, but note that it is the 8/256GB variant.

In Germany, the A56 and A36 get a free storage upgrade, i.e. the price of the 8/128GB and 8/256GB models is the same right now. The A26 is only available in 6/128GB configuration, however.

In India, there are discounts listed, but they just bring down the Galaxy A56 and A36 prices to the ones announced at launch. Note that there are versions of both phones with 12GB of RAM, which are not available in Europe. As for the Galaxy A26, it will not be sold in India.

Check out our Galaxy A56 and A36 hands-on review for a more detailed look at both phones.

We may get a commission from qualifying sales.

Samsung Galaxy A56
